heading: HOW TO BUILD YOUR OWN EXCHANGE?

option1.title: Build your own relayer backend
option1.details: You can choose to build your very own relayer backend system for your exchange by following Loopring's protocol rules. We strongly encourage you to go through our Design Doc and check out the backend-specific documentation.

option2.title: Use Lightcone's relayer service
option2.details: You may also consider using Lightcone Technology's production-ready Relayer-as-a-Service. Adopting a third-party relayer will allow you to launch a DEX quickly and focus on regulation, token listing, and other business activities.
